# laxmi narasimha swamy temple,venkateshwara,ramalingeshwara and many other temples
# The famous and lovely river , Godavari ..

value: firstly ,we must take a bath in river Godavari
then visit dattatreya,santoshima,rama, saibaba temple and other temples near by Godavari.
then visit sri laxmi narasimha swamy, venkateshwara and other temples..

other places and near by places to see :

value: Gudem - Shrine of Lord Satyanarayana swamy (10 Km)
Kondagaattu- Shrine of Lord Anjaneya swamy (45 km)
Vemulawada - Shrine of Lord Raja Rajeshwara swamy (70 km)
Basara - Shrine of Lord Saraswathi Devi ( 170 km)

if possilble,stay at local residents' home and have a lovely home food..
